reviewText:
The WrestlingVixxxens concept was a good idea on a money drawing level
But, it was put out during early high speed internet and poor quality equipment
So it was a great concept created way to soon
So called wrestling fans can trash Missy Hyatt and Sunny for doing this but, how is what they did any different then
Paris Hilton and Kim Kardashian???  Sex sells and it can help brand you to some extent

This was just a great idea put out there to early when the internet wasn't fully ready for the idea

This is the second print of Wrestling Vixens Untamed  (by some strange company i never heard of) It's certainly not worth the insane asking price
It's odd originally this version was super cheap while the original dvd was over priced now it's the complete opposite the first print is being sold for pennies on the dollar ok $5.00 still that's cheap

If you know of Missy Hyatt and Sunny this is kind of a must have it's mostly behind the scenes footage from the website
The footage is average (SD)  you get Missy, Tammy and former XPW's valet Kristi Myst exposed
It's playboy quality stuff if you know what i mean
If you must have it get the original print that runs $5.00

Now this is the only vixens type dvd I have and I only got it for Tammy Lynn Sytch but oh my god. I have never seen anything that comes close to this. It was terrible. The girls are old, fat or plastic. All they do is stare at the camera and take their clothes of while old porno music is playing. No talk or playfulness just has beens trying dismally to act sexy. And the camerawork looked like some kid who has just got a camcorder and editing program and told to be artistic. The colour is all over the place it even goes to a negative colour for a while. Even for a cheap thrill this is useless.

I was somewhat disappointed with Wrestling Vixens Wrestlerotica because the full frontal was minimal there was too much stuff (actual wrestling footage and boring, cable-edit sex action) that took away from what you want to see - the girls. Got Vixens Untamed and it seems they've figured things out. It has more girls, hotter girls, they got rid of the extraneous garbage, and added more pink for your viewing pleasure. The spreads on this are fantasic, with nice close-ups that hold long enough for you to do your thing, and less cut-aways. This one has more girls willing to show more and some really blistering scenes. Highlights here are Missy (the age & surgery a bit weird, but still great body), Mona, Kristi's always good, and there's a little blonde named Shannon who steals the flick with some hot dancing and squats (she has definitely spun on a pole or 2 in her time). Worth checking out for those who like to supplement their AV collection with a little softcore fun from time to time.

THIS IS BASICALLY A CONTINUATION OF WRESTLEROTICA.WHEN YOUR

BORED AND YOU WANT TO PUNCH THE MONKEY, WATCH THIS DVD.

IT WILL DEFINATELY HELP YOU GET THE JOB DONE. TAMMY SYTCH AND

MISSY HYATT ARE TOTALLY NUDE AND DONT LOOK TOO BAD.GRAB THE

JOY JELLY AND ENJOY
